properties.description: Load text data from On-prim to STG
Load text data from On-prim to STG
Load text data from On-prim to STG

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT  CONVERT(VARCHAR, [CALC_DATA_DT], 112) AS DATA_DT FROM ',pipeline().globalParameters.P_GLBL_CNTL_SCHEMA,'.[CNTL_CFG_STREM] WHERE STREM_NM = ''' , pipeline().parameters.P_STREAM, '''')
